con:testCase.name: Geocoding Test Case
con:testCase.con:description: Geocoding test steps: -Sample request validates the the geometry response of specified location -Invalid_request validates status code response when there is missing parameter -Zero_results validates status code response when we put incorrect parameters in URL request -Request_denied validates status response code when we put incorrect key value -Viewport_biasing validates response when there are bound in parameters -Region_biasing validates response when there is region parameter -Component_filtering validates reponse when are included component parameters -Excluding_component_filter validates response when there are excluded parameters -Geocode postive test step validates main functionality of Gecode service, that is conversion of address into geographic coordinates, in XML format

con:assertion.name: Check for keyword in status response
Check for keyword in status response

con:testCase.name: Reverse Geocoding Test Case
con:testCase.con:description: - Reverse_geocode_sample request validates response of reverse geocoding simple request - Reverse_geocode_place_ID validates response of reverse geocoding when is included place_id in parameters - Reverse_geocode_restricted_by_type validates response of reverse geocoding when address is restricted with a location type - Reverse_geocode_validates one invalid_request , for example when some of the parameters is missing (address, components or latlng) - Reverse_geocode_XML validates response of main functionality of reverse geocode, that is conversion of geographic coordinates into human-readable address

con:assertion.name: Check for specific keyword in response
Check for specific keyword in response
Check for keyword type in response

con:testStep.name: GET - Reverse Geocode INVALID REQUEST(Negative test)

con:testCase.name: Geocode and Reverse SMOKE
con:testCase.con:description: Geocode and Reverse Smoke Test Case includes: - Sample geocode smoke test- examines main functionality of geocode and validates response in xml format - Sample geocode reverse smoke test - examines main functionality of reverse geocode and and validates response in xml format
